channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Best Of QVC Beauty
channel.desc: All the highlights and star products.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Steals and Deals
channel.desc: Love beauty? Tune in to see the latest deals and bag a beauty bargain. We've got an exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to adore.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Best Of QVC Beauty
channel.desc: All the highlights and star products.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Loves with Dyson Haircare
channel.desc: Love beauty? Tune in to see our exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to love, featuring Dyson's high-tech Supersonic Hairdryer.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Elemis Skin Therapies
channel.desc: Care for your mind and body holistically and sensuously with therapeutic aromatherapy. Elemis are famed for their premier spa and salon treatments, and for the absolute purity of their plant oils.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Refresh
channel.desc: Feeling a little rundown after Christmas? Join us for the January Beauty Weekend show with brand new products, must-have favourites and Today's Special Value offers from Tria and Decleor.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Best Of QVC Beauty
channel.desc: All the highlights and star products.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Best Of QVC Beauty
channel.desc: All the highlights and star products.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Steals and Deals
channel.desc: Love beauty? Tune in to see the latest deals and bag a beauty bargain. We've got an exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to adore.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Best Of QVC Beauty
channel.desc: All the highlights and star products.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Best Of QVC Beauty
channel.desc: All the highlights and star products.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Australian Bodycare
channel.desc: This Australian Bodycare range is inspired by the ancient traditions of the Aborigines who discovered the effects of natural ingredients. Find cleansing and caring products for your skin.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Best Of QVC Beauty
channel.desc: All the highlights and star products.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: SKINN Skincare
channel.desc: Everyone deserves access to skincare innovations, which is why the SKINN brand creates formulas with a scientific approach, to promote lifelong beauty and wellness.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Steals and Deals
channel.desc: Love beauty? Tune in to see the latest deals and bag a beauty bargain. We've got an exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to adore.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty on 4 Easy Pay
channel.desc: Discover a huge range of fabulous beauty and skincare products from top brands and spread the cost with four easy interest-free instalments, helping you enjoy your favourite beauty on a budget.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Live Well with Ultrasun
channel.desc: From running errands to holidays in the sunshine, UItrasun has you covered! Offering incredible SPF formulas for the whole family, discover non-greasy, powerful sun cream that lets you feel fabulous.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: skinSense by Abi Cleeve
channel.desc: Bringing together the latest, ground-breaking technology with the highest grade concentration of unique active ingredients, discover long-lasting skincare with anti-ageing benefits from skinSense.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Prai Beauty
channel.desc: Prai is a ginger-like root that has been harvested in the tropical forests of Thailand for more than 1000 years. This range of prestige skincare combines traditional wisdom with the latest technology.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Bronze Goddess With Estee Lauder
channel.desc: Bronze Goddess With Estee Lauder.
